body.name: Tree of Life Note Cards (Stationery) (Note Card Series)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 19 hrs 44 mins
body.description: Distinctive note cards are a pleasure to use Versatile design is suitable for a variety of occasions Keep a box on hand for whenever a handwritten note is warranted. Exceptional value Premium boxed set features crisp note cards of substantial stock and stationery envelopes constructed of quality paper. Note card set comes in an attractive box suitable for gift-giving. Send a message of distinction Choose an elegantly appointed note card that presents your best self.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: When only a personal note will do Send a card that makes a lasting impression.

Premium boxed stationery set comes with 14 note cards and 15 envelopes Details make the difference Intricate gold foiling illuminates our coppery Tree of Life. Card is embellished with a graceful braid-look border delicately outlined in gold foil. Textured linen-finish exterior. Superior card stock Inside, you'll find a smooth-finish writing surface - no smudging or streaking. Quality card stock takes pen beautifully. The interior of the card is blank to accommodate your personal message. Matching stationery envelopes included Classic ivory stationery envelopes. Envelopes are constructed of quality paper. We include one extra envelope because no one is perfect.

Distinctive note cards are a pleasure to use Versatile design is suitable for a variety of occasions Keep a box on hand for whenever a handwritten note is warranted. Exceptional value Premium boxed set features crisp note cards of substantial stock and stationery envelopes constructed of quality paper. Note card set comes in an attractive box suitable for gift-giving. Send a message of distinction Choose an elegantly appointed note card that presents your best self. About our Tree of Life Note Cards: Set comes with 14 folded note cards with blank interiors 15 matching stationery envelopes Cards measure 5'' wide x 3-1/2'' high Stationery set comes in a matching box with a clear acetate lid
Typewriter Note Cards Hedgehog Note Cards Gold Cross Note Cards Music Note Cards Quill Pen and Ink Note Cards Rainbow Note Cards

Our Company History In 1928, at the age of twenty-two, Peter Beilenson began printing books on a small press in the basement of his parents’ home in Larchmont, New York. Peter - and later, his wife, Edna - sought to create fine books that sold at prices even a pauper could afford. Today, still family owned and operated, Peter Pauper Press continues to honor our founders’ legacy - and our customers’ expectations - of beauty, quality, and value. Image: Peter Pauper Press headquarters, circa 1948.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These cards are beautiful in a simple and elegant way. I will always keep some on hand as they are suitable for almost any occasion. The paper is very good quality, price affordable. Definitely will repurchase these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love “Tree of Life” emblem and quality cards
reviews.reviewText: These cards are lovely. Thick, quality paper.I immediately purchased more of these from the same company. Great cards and love the crispness of the image. Very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars intricate, simple, elegant
reviews.reviewText: These are exactly what I wanted. I was looking for something blank that I could send to people I care about for whatever occasion I deem them suitable (graduation, life event, first day of college, death in the family, etc.) They are simple, elegant, and affordable. Make sure you understand the dimensions before you buy because these are the on "small side" but I knew that before purchasing and I'm fine with that. They also include a nice gold painted thick cardboard box with clear plexiglass lid for storing them in, that is nice as well!It is difficult to see from the photos but as others have pointed out, the tree is beautiful. The leaves are a shimmery purple, the trunk and roots a nice brown, and there are thin golden lines woven throughout the tree, accenting it nicely.I like how they also provide you with an extra envelope, nice touch!I will buy again, certainly when they are only $.45/card!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Touch of Class for Notes
reviews.reviewText: These Tree of Life notecards are a great way to send a message to someone with a touch of elegance. The paper stock is nice and heavy with an embossed design and matching envelopes. They’re stylish yet understated, with the design working perfectly for any and all occasions. A great set for those who like fine stationary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality! I have bought Crane notecards in the past, which have become quite expensive. These are just as beautiful but a much better value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These are the quality you'd expect to pay top dollor for in a stationery shop or office supply store. Heavy weight linen like paper and envelopes. Absolutely crisp, multi colored, intricate multi-color graghic. They're just beautiful cards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Elegant. Subtle design. High quality paper. Versatile. You can feel proud to send these cards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2014
reviews.reviewText: I love the simple and classy design of this tree and purchased these so my husband and son would have more masculine cards to write thank you notes. The only reason I gave this four stars instead of five is because this company seems to have a thing about using tape on the boxes when it isn't necessary and is sloppily done with the tape applied crooked and wrinkled. The clear plastic lid fits snuggly inside the box so tape isn't necessary. If I was giving this as a gift I'd feel a need to remove the tape and residue it leaves behind first.
These are tasteful writing notes, made with high-quality paper. Will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 29, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I really like Peter pauper press stationary and this card is my favourite. Excellent quality and elegant design.
Adorable, classy lil notecards ... good for the few words with which we communicate condolences, appreciate efforts, and ask for some help. B'days? Yes, apt for using as greeting cards.
Beautiful cards at a reasonable price. Lovely quality card stock and the perfect size for a brief note. Very pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: I don't really know what this means for a note card
reviews.reviewText: I use them as cards for anything as they are so delightful. All their cards are equally lovely.
